price: Ó ń pa gbogbo n̄ǹkan rẹ́ (ìyẹn nínú ìlú wọn) pẹ̀lú àṣẹ Olúwa rẹ̀. Nígbà náà, wọ́n di ẹni tí wọn kò rí mọ́ àfi àwọn ibùgbé wọn. Báyẹn ni A ṣe ń san ìjọ ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ ní ẹ̀san.
arabic: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَيۡءِۭ بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصۡبَحُواْ لَا يُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: tudammiru kulla shayin bi-amri rabbihā fa-aṣbaḥū lā yurā illā masākinuhum kadhālika najzī al-qawma al-muj'rimīna
